wikipedia_page.main: John McGregor (born 5 January 1963 in Airdrie) is a former professional footballer.

response: Brown took over as coach of Rangers' Under-18s in 1997 before moving on to coach the reserve team in 2003, replacing former teammate John McGregor. He left the Rangers coaching setup on 27 June 2006, weeks after the appointment of new manager Paul Le Guen.
John MacGregor, John Macgregor or John McGregor may refer to:
* John McGregor (footballer, born 1851), Scottish international football player
* John McGregor (footballer, born 1900) (1900–1993), English football player
* John McGregor (footballer, born 1963), Scottish football player
* John McGregor (Upper Canada politician) (c. 1751–1828), businessman and political figure in Upper Canada
